shortdesc.ph: Registers an audio frame observer object.

section.p: This method is used to register the voice observer object, that is, register the callback. When the engine needs to give or callback, you need to use this method to register the callback.
section.note: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

pd.p: Interface object instance. Relevant links: If it is passed in, it means to cancel the registration. We recommend calling after receiving to release the voice observer object.
